entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Periods of rain beginning early this evening then changing to 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections late this evening and overnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening then periods of rain. Wind becoming east 30 km/h after midnight. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 03 January 2023
